name: Vienna House Easy By Wyndham Berlin Potsdamer Platz
description: No description found

name: W22 Hotel am Kurfürstendamm
description: Located in Berlin and with Kurfürstendamm reachable within 1.4 km, W22 Hotel am Kurfürstendamm provides a shared lounge, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. Built in 1912, this 3-star hotel is within 2.3 km of Zoologischer Garten underground station and 4.6 km of Messe Berlin. The hotel features family rooms. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units include a wardrobe. W22 Hotel am Kurfürstendamm offers a children's playground. Berliner Philharmonie is 5.4 km from the accommodation, while Holocaust Memorial is 5.7 km away. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport, 25 km from W22 Hotel am Kurfürstendamm.

name: Loginn Hotel Berlin Airport
description: Located in Berlin and with East Side Gallery reachable within 19 km, LOGINN Hotel Berlin Airport provides express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. The property is around 21 km from Alexanderplatz Underground Station, 21 km from Gendarmenmarkt and 21 km from Alexanderplatz. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Some rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a fridge, a microwave and a stovetop. Guest rooms at LOGINN Hotel Berlin Airport are equipped with a seating area. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Speaking German and English, staff are always on hand to help at the 24-hour front desk. Berlin Cathedral is 21 km from LOGINN Hotel Berlin Airport, while Berlin TV Tower is 21 km away. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel-Pension Funk am Kurfürstendamm
description: No description found

name: Hotel Schöneberg
description: Boasting an excellent central location in the lively Schöneberg district of Berlin, the 3-star Hotel Schöneberg offers free WiFi, well-equipped rooms, great public transport links and a friendly atmosphere. The Hotel Schöneberg's bright and spacious rooms are an ideal place to relax. All of the rooms feature an en suite bathroom, modern furniture and comfortable beds. After an exciting sightseeing trip in the German capital, unwind and socialise at the hotel bar with a refreshing draught beer or a glass of wine. An S-Bahn (city rail) station is just 500 metres away from the Hotel Schöneberg, providing a link to the Brandenburg Gate and the Potsdamer Platz entertainment district in less than 10 minutes.

name: SORAT Hotel Berlin
description: Berlin and the famous KaDeWe at your doorstep: In the middle of this exciting district is where you will the Sorat Hotel Berlin. An unconventional city hotel, with fun and esprit and a furnishing that is an original mixture of traditional and modern design themes. Experience urban styled or more classic oriented rooms and the creative design of an exceptional lobby. Pampering moments await you in the morning at the lobby with our little complimentary grab and go breakfast. The lobby with bar is also a place to work, relax or socialize all day and late into the evening. Whether you are here for business or simply a short break, the Sorat Hotel Berlin has all you need to relax and the location makes it an ideal choice for a stay in Berlin. Just a short walk from KaDeWe and Wittenbergplatz tube station and also close to Kurfrstendamm and Gedchtniskirche, Zoologischer Garten rail station, it is perfectly placed for shopping and sightseeing. If you are traveling as a family with two adults and one child or more, please contact us by email or phone. Imprint: NMV Beherbergungs GmbH & Co. Betriebs KG, Bayreuther Strasse 44, DE 10787 Berlin, Phone +49 30 - 21 90 21 60, internet@sorat-hotels.com, CEO Nicolas Meissner, Registered office: Berlin, Charlottenburg local court, Commercial register HRB 95417 B, VAT ID number DE 308271595. >>> Privacy policyiHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Elba am Kurfürstendamm - Design Chambers
description: This Berlin hotel lies next to the Kurfürstendamm Shopping Street and is just a 5-minute walk from Savignyplatz Train Station. Its rooms include hot drinks facilities and free Wi-Fi. Different breakfast options are available every day of the week at Hotel Elba am Kurfürstendamm. In warm weather, guests can dine outside on the terrace. The modern rooms at Hotel Elba feature warm colours and an elegant en suite bathroom with toiletries. Each room is equipped with a TV. Guests are also welcome to relax in the cosy hotel library. The popular Savignyplatz Square is just 650 metres from the Hotel Elba, which offers many restaurants, cafés and bars. Berlin Zoo is a 15-minute walk away.

name: H24 Berlin Lichtenberg
description: Set in Berlin, 5.6 km from East Side Gallery, H24 Berlin Lichtenberg offers accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and an ATM, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can make use of a bar. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, the units at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms here will provide you with a seating area. At H24 Berlin Lichtenberg every room has bed linen and towels. Alexanderplatz Underground Station is 6 km from the accommodation, while Alexanderplatz is 6.4 km away. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport, 20 km from H24 Berlin Lichtenberg.

name: Solitaire Hotel & Boardinghouse Berlin
description: This hotel in Berlin's diplomatic district of Pankow-Niederschönhausen offers environmentally friendly accommodation, attractive wellness facilities, and good public transport connections. Enjoying a peaceful green location, the privately run Solitaire Hotel features an attractive palm garden and Wi-Fi internet access (available for a surcharge). All of the Solitaire's en-suite rooms include comfortable beds and large desks. They are suitable for guests with mobility problems. From the hotel, you can drive to the Alexanderplatz square in about 20 minutes. The Schönholz S-Bahn (city rail) station is a 10-minute walk away, providing direct services to the Brandenburg Gate and Potsdamer Platz square. A bus serving the city centre stops at your doorstep. Relax in the Solitaire's modern sauna and solarium, and pay a visit to the in-house massage studio, beauty salon, and hairdresser. Do not miss the on-site art gallery. The Solitaire's beautiful restaurant and Weinstube (wine lounge), Zur Fröhlichen Pfalz, will spoil you with specialities from the Palatinate region and international dishes. In fine weather, you can relax on the summer terrace.

name: Hotel Spree-idyll
description: This 3-star hotel is part of the Wassersportzentrum Berlin water sports centre, located directly beside the River Spree. Free WiFi and a sauna with fitness room for a surcharge are offered here, and boats can be rented nearby. The non-smoking Hotel Spree-idyll has spacious rooms and minibar. Rooms in the second hotel building feature a balcony. Guests at the Spree Idyll are welcome to use the Wassersportzentrum’s gym and sauna area. The spacious terrace invites guests to enjoy the sun. Bikes can be stored in the bicycle room free of charge. Full buffet breakfasts are prepared at the Spree Idyll Hotel in the mornings. Parking is free at the Spree Idyll. Drivers are only 5 minutes from the Old Town district of Köpenick and 10 minutes from the Kindl-Bühne Wuhlheide concert venue. Berlin city centre is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Benn
description: Boasting a timber-framed façade, this family-run 3-star hotel in Berlin's Spandau district is a 1-minute walk from the St. Nikolaikirche church and a 10-minute walk from the famous Spandau Citadel. Dating back to 1800, the Hotel Benn enjoys a peaceful yet well-connected location in Spandau's charming old quarter. The Altstadt Spandau U-Bahn (underground) station is only a 3-minute walk away, providing easy access to famous Berlin attractions such as the Kurfürstendamm boulevard. The Spandau S-Bahn (city rail) station quickly connects you to the Olympic Stadium, ICC exhibition grounds, and historic Friedrichstrasse. Look forward to the Hotel Benn's cosily furnished rooms, free Wi-Fi internet access, and freshly prepared breakfast buffet in the mornings. Private parking facilities are available for a surcharge and by prior arrangement.

name: Hampton by Hilton Berlin City Centre Alexanderplatz
description: Right in the heart of the city, surrounded by famous attractions, you’ll find the Hampton by Hilton Berlin City Centre Alexanderplatz hotel. With the nearest train station just a 5 minute walk from our hotel, it’s easy to see the sights. Spend a night on the town in the entertainment district. Experience panoramic views of the city at the TV Tower and discover Berlin’s vibrant nightlife in various bars and restaurants. Shuttle service is available by reservation. Each day of your stay in Alexanderplatz is off to a great start with our hot breakfast included in your stay, featuring all your favorites including eggs, beans, waffles, fruit and more. Stop by the 24/7 Hub when you have a late night craving. Unwind in a spacious room with a 40-inch HDTV, free WiFi and an inviting armchair with ottoman. Rest peacefully on a clean and comfy bed. Make tea and coffee right in your own room. Ask our friendly team about connecting rooms and accessible room options.Hilton

name: Good Morning + Berlin City East
description: Situated in Berlin, Good Morning + Berlin City East has a shared lounge, terrace, bar, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is located 5.9 km from Alexanderplatz Underground Station, 6.4 km from Alexanderplatz and 7.2 km from Berlin Cathedral. The property is non-smoking and is set 5.3 km from East Side Gallery. At the hotel, rooms have a desk, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. At Good Morning + Berlin City East, every room is fitted with a seating area. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast is available each morning at the property. Speaking German and English, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Berlin TV Tower is 7.4 km from the accommodation, while German Historical Museum is 7.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport, 19 km from Good Morning + Berlin City East.

name: Come Inn Berlin Kurfürstendamm
description: This hotel on Berlin's Kurfürstendamm shopping street offers modern rooms with great views, 24-hour reception and underground parking. The historic Gedächtniskirche Church is 5 minutes away by bus. All of the bright rooms at the Come Inn Berlin Kurfürstendamm Opera feature air conditioning, a work desk, and a safety deposit box. A varied buffet is served each morning in the Come Inn's breakfast room with panoramic roof terrace. Guests can relax in the bar in the evenings. Adenauerplatz Underground Station is a 5-minute walk from the Come Inn Berlin. This provides excellent transport connections for shopping, sightseeing and business.

name: MOXY Berlin Ostbahnhof
description: Berlin is a city of contemporary history, the place to be for alternative art and the underground scene. MOXY Berlin Ostbahnhof in Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg created its own version of creativity. Located at the Ostbahnhof and conveniently connected to public transportation and the airport, this comfortable hotel with the soul of a boutique hotel has an affordable rate to cater to all its guests. We give you serious style at a not-so-serious price point. The service is smart, the design awesome, and the technology state-of-the-art. Ask our crew to help you explore the city or relax and enjoy yourself in the lobby, where food and drinks are available 24/7. There is the free use of Wi-Fi all throughout the hotel, and its speed is furiously fast. Of course, you sample the local spirits at the bar or while you unwind in a comfy sofa. Meet up with old and new friends at Moxy, and go out to Berlin’s famous nightclubs Berghain and Kater Blau, close by.Marriott

name: Hotel Aquino Berlin
description: The 3-star Superior Hotel Aquino offers quiet rooms with work area and free internet. It is a 3-minute walk from the Friedrichstrasse shopping street and enjoys excellent transport links. The Hotel Aquino Tagungszentrum is located in Berlin's central Mitte district. Oranienburger Tor underground and tram stops are a 4-minute walk away, and Berlin's central station is a 15-minute walk away. All rooms include a small work area with free internet via cable. The Hotel Aquino also offers various conference rooms, and a church is available on site. The Aquino offers a large breakfast buffet each morning. Many restaurants and bars are within a 5-minute walk.

name: Air in Berlin Hotel
description: Boasting a beautiful Art Nouveau façade and excellent transport connections, this 3-star-superior hotel near Berlin's famous Kurfürstendamm boulevard is just a 3-minute walk from the KaDeWe department store. Set in a quiet side street, the non-smoking Hotel Air in Berlin is a 3-minute walk from the Wittenbergplatz U-Bahn (underground) station, served by 3 underground lines and several bus routes. Relax in the hotel's stylish, brightly decorated rooms before exploring the countless shops and entertainment venues of the Ku'damm area. The Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church is only a 10-minute walk away. Help yourself to the Air in Berlin's tasty breakfast buffet for an additional fee. During your stay, pay a visit to the hotel's Berlin-Bar, serving freshly brewed coffee, tasty beer, and snacks. In fine weather, you can look forward to the summer garden.

name: Motel One Berlin Mitte
description: This modern hotel offers stylish accommodation and free Wi-Fi in the lively Kreuzberg district of Berlin. The Motel One is just steps from Moritzplatz Underground Station. As a guest at the Motel One Berlin Mitte, you can look forward to air-conditioned rooms equipped with a flat-screen TV and a granite-finish bathroom with a rainforest shower. After an eventful day, take it easy in the hotel’s One Lounge, which combines a reception, a breakfast café and a bar. The One Lounge serves a range of beverages and snacks 24 hours a day. Popular attractions such as Checkpoint Charlie, the Potsdamer Platz entertainment district and the Jewish Museum can be reached within minutes using the underground.

name: M-Pire Hotel Berlin
description: Set in Berlin and with East Side Gallery reachable within 13 km, M-Pire Hotel Berlin offers a tour desk, allergy-free rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. Private parking is available on site. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At M-Pire Hotel Berlin all rooms include bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, continental and vegetarian options. Alexanderplatz Underground Station is 13 km from the accommodation, while Gendarmenmarkt is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport, 8 km from M-Pire Hotel Berlin.

name: Moxy Berlin Airport
description: Located within reach of terminal 1 & 2, Moxy Berlin Airport is the perfect place to rest after a long flight, or get ready before an early one. At this 236-room hotel, the modern traveler can find all the perks and none of the fuss they need when on the road, from furiously fast wi-fi to 24/7 Grab and Go, Moxy has got you covered. And a selection of signature cocktails, local craft beer, and finger licking foods make sure no matter what time you land in Berlin, there's something to satisfy any craving. Our cosy and smart rooms, with 42-inch TV with Chromecast, cushy platform beds and USB galore to power up your stay, are great to relax, work and sleep. And for those traveling with friends, even the furry ones, our family rooms offer plenty of space for everyone. Curious about Berlin's attractions. Take advantage of the furiously fast and free wi-fi, the city is just 40 minutes away by train with easy connections to Berlin Hauptbahnhof and Ostbahnhof.Marriott

name: Amano East Side
description: The Hotel AMANO East Side offers 174 rooms in four different categories, a high-end bar, a conference center, a restaurant and a rooftop bar. The hotel is very centrally located at Stralauer Platz in Berlin-Friedrichshain and well connected to the public transport via the Berlin Ostbahnhof station. Shops, restaurants and Berlin sights are in walking distance from the hotel and easily reachable for the guests.The Hotel AMANO East Side offers all of the guests a Mobile Check-in for an individual and comfortable check-in experience as well as an optional Mobile Key that can be downloaded onto the mobile device. Every room also has a tablet with telephone function and diverse service options to guarantee an enjoyable stay at AMANO East Side with no wishes left unfulfilled.iHotelier/iStay

name: the niu Flash
description: Located in Berlin and within 2 km of Zoologischer Garten underground station, the niu Flash features a bar, allergy-free rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 2.6 km from Kurfürstendamm, 4.1 km from Brandenburg Gate and 4.1 km from Reichstag. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At the niu Flash each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Staff speak German and English at the reception. Berliner Philharmonie is 4.3 km from the niu Flash, while Holocaust Memorial is 4.5 km away. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport, 29 km from the hotel.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Berlin Humboldthain Park
description: AC Hotel Berlin Humboldthain Park is an urban oasis. Located in the heart of Berlin, you will be able to explore the main landmarks of the city. AC knows exactly what you need, out intuitive design strikes the perfect balance, allowing you to maximise your enjoyment during your stay. You can expect flexible open spaces to experience signature moments.Marriott

name: aletto Hotel Potsdamer Platz
description: Newly opened in May 2020, this hotel is centrally located in Berlin, within a 15-minute walk from Potsdamer Platz. It offers free WiFi, stylish interiors and a garden to relax in. All rooms at aletto Hotel Potsdamer Platz boast a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom The area is popular for cycling. The multilingual staff at the 24-hour front desk are always on hand to help. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Checkpoint Charlie and the Berlin Philharmonic. The nearest airport is Berlin Tegel Airport, 11 km from aletto Hotel Potsdamer Platz.

name: Hotel Lützow
description: This Berlin hotel is near the Tiergarten park and within walking distance of the the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church, Berlin Zoo, the KaDeWe department store and the Kurfürstendamm shopping street. Free WiFi is available except in the Basic category rooms. Hotel Lützow’s rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a complimentary bottle of mineral water. Some rooms are wheelchair accessible. Communal kitchenettes can also be used. A small breakfast or a hot & cold buffet are available at the hotel café. A 15-minute walk takes guests to the Kurfürstendamm shopping street, while Berlin’s famous KaDeWe department store is only 700 metres away. Hotel Lützow is an 8-minute walk from Wittenbergplatz Underground Station. A bus stop can be found 200 metres away and public parking is available nearby.

name: Hotel Mani By Amano
description: If Berlin is, in its own words, poor but sexy, then Hotel MANI is rich but easy going. Rich in design, rich in innovation and rich in appeal for all the senses. At a level that is equal parts sophisticated and nonchalant. Marble, chrome and leather bring just the right essence of cool to an atmosphere that screams uniqueness from each of its 63 rooms. But were nally in Berlin, and thats how we do things here. Guests staying at Hotel MANI will enjoy the modern lobby, the culinary meltingiHotelier/iStay

name: Hampton by Hilton Berlin City West
description: Just a 5-minute walk from the Kurfürstendamm shopping street, this Hampton by Hilton hotel in Berlin's Charlottenburg district offers air-conditioned rooms, free Wi-Fi and free use of the modern gym. Every room at the Hampton by Hilton Berlin City West features a flat-screen TV, tea/coffee facilities, and a bathroom with glass shower. Many rooms have a terrace overlooking the city. A buffet breakfast is provided each morning at the Hampton Berlin. Hot drinks and light meals are available in the Hampton by Hilton’s 24-hour snack area. The Hilton Berlin City West’s 24-hour business area offers a library, 3 internet terminals and a printer which can be used free of charge. Uhlandstraße Underground Station is just 400 metres from the Hampton by Hilton. Trains run to the famous KaDeWe department store in 3 minutes.

name: Fjord Hotel Berlin
description: This modern hotel in central Berlin is just a 10-minute walk from the Potsdamer Platz square. It offers stylish, modern rooms, a delicious daily breakfast buffet with a large selection of regional and organic products, and a summer terrace on the ground floor for breakfast or to chill. Elegant rooms at the fjord hotel Berlin feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a bright bathroom. Rooms for disabled guests are available upon request. WiFi is provided free of charge for guests in all rooms and public areas. Mendelssohn-Bartholdy-Park Underground Station is 200 metres from the fjord hotel berlin. Bus connections to Alexanderplatz square and Berlin city centre are less than 300 metres away. Tea and coffee are free for hotel guests from 12:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m

name: Hotel Art Nouveau
description: This design hotel in Berlin's Charlottenburg district is 200 metres from the Kurfürstendamm shopping street and 500 metres from the lively Savignyplatz square. Wi-Fi internet is free. Art Nouveau Hotel am Kurfürstendamm offers theme rooms and suites that are individually furnished and feature antiques, high ceilings, wooden floors and stylish linen. A large BIO-buffet with regional and biological products is served each morning in the bright breakfast room of the Art Nouveau Hotel am Kurfürstendamm. Guests will find many restaurants located within a 10-minute walk of the property. Guests enjoy free daily newspapers and a free use of an internet terminal in the lobby. Local telephone calls are also free.Tea and coffee is available free of charge throughout the day. Late check-out is possible at Art Nouveau Hotel. The hotel can also arrange a massage for guests. The RE7 or S9 train runs from BER Airport to S Charlottenburg. From S Charlottenburg its another 8 Minutes walk to the Hotel. Bus X34 goes to Berlin's ICC Exhibition Centre. Public car parks are available

name: Hotel Kastanienhof Berlin
description: Featuring original works of art, rich breakfast buffets, and easy transport connections, this 3-star-Superior hotel in Berlin lies on the trendy Kastanienallee street, between the Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg districts. The traditional-style Hotel Kastanienhof has spacious rooms and suites with flat-screen TVs and a modern bathroom. Each room offers free internet. Old paintings and objects from this part of Berlin can be found throughout the Hotel Kastanienhof. Dinner is available at the hotel in the evenings. Rental bicycles are available at the Hotel Kastanienhof on request. Free regional newspapers and tourist information leaflets are provided. Guests can also buy transport tickets and book sightseeing trips. The Kastanienallee tram stop is just outside the Hotel Kastanienhof. Alexanderplatz can be reached in 15 minutes by public transport. Senefelder Platz Underground Station is 8 minutes away on foot.

name: Holiday Inn Express Berlin - Alexanderplatz
description: Central Berlin hotel close to Museum Island. Wi-Fi and breakfast are always included.The Holiday Inn Express® Berlin - Alexanderplatz hotel is a 10-minute walk from Alexanderplatz and the trendy shops and cafés of Hackescher Markt.Key local businesses like Deutsche Bahn, Deutsche Telekom and Universal Music are easily accessible by taxi. Trade fairs at Messe Berlin can be reached in half an hour by public transport, and international flights from Berlin Airport (BER) can be made in less than 40 minutes by car or train via S9. There’s a world-class arts and antiquities collection in the grand buildings on nearby Museum Island, while the Brandenburg Gate, the Memorial of the Berlin Wall, and the Holocaust Memorial are all 15 minutes away by bus or U-Bahn from nearby stops. For a taste of Berlin's celebrated culinary scene in the evening, head to Mitte's restaurant-lined Torstrasse.At this hotel you can enjoy:- Wi-Fi included- Express Start™ Breakfast included in the room rate- Outdoor terrace- Parking for a daily feeSleek, soundproof guest rooms offer blackout curtains for comfort, integrated bedside USB ports for your devices, and flat-screen Smart TVs. The hotel's open lobby has a Business Corner with a computer and printer if you need to work, and if you’re feeling hungry, snacks are available around the clock from the All Day Dining menu.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Motel One Berlin - Upper West
description: This new hotel is situated in the Charlottenburg district in the heart of western Berlin. The Motel One Berlin-Upper West is opposite the iconic Kaiser-Wilhelm Memorial Church and just off the Ku'damm boulevard. Rooms all feature a contemporary design, air conditioning, a LOEWE™ flat-screen TV, a movable desk, box-spring beds and high-quality bed linen. The en suite bathrooms include a raindance shower, shower gel and fluffy towels. The rooms located between the 11st and 18th floors boast spectacular city views. The Motel One Berlin-Upper West also features a 24-hour reception as well as free WiFi in all areas. A rich buffet breakfast is available in the One Lounge each morning. Kurfürstendamm Underground Station and the Zoologischer Garten Train Station are within a 5-minute walk of the hotel, offering excellent public transport connections across the German capital.

name: Novotel Suites Berlin City Potsdamer Platz
description: The 3-star Novotel Suites Berlin City Potsdamer Platz hotel invites you to enjoy a relaxing stay in Berlin in our 323-sq.ft. (30-m²) suites. The Suites are equipped with kitchenette, double bed and extra bed, shower, bathtub and separate toilet. Start the day with our extensive buffet breakfast and put the day to bed at the hotel bar. Every Thursday, you will receive a complimentary ten-minute massage.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Sachsenhof
description: This 3-star hotel is located in a quiet side street in Berlin’s Schöneberg district, a 2-minute walk from the lively Nollendorfplatz Square. Hotel Sachsenhof offers a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. Hotel Sachsenhof is a traditional Berlin residential building. The spacious rooms are simply furnished and feature cable TV, a cosy seating area and a modern bathroom. Nollendorfplatz Underground Station is a 2-minute walk from Hotel Sachsenhof, offering great transport links to Berlin’s main tourist attractions on 4 different underground lines. A full breakfast is served each morning in the Sachsenhof’s breakfast room. There are many cafés and restaurants nearby. Coffee and tea are available free of charge until 20:00. Guests can walk to the world-famous KaDeWe Mall and the Kurfürstendamm shopping street in 12 minutes.

name: Hotel Carolinenhof
description: Boasting a direct underground connection to Kurfürstendamm and the Zoologischer Garten, the Hotel Carolinenhof provides a central base for exploring Berlin’s shops and sights. This family-run, bed & breakfast establishment offers modern and welcoming bedrooms, as well as apartments with fully equipped kitchen and balcony. All feature free high-speed internet. It enjoys an easily accessible location in Berlin’s western centre, just a few steps away from an underground station. When you need a break from sightseeing, simply relax in the hotel’s spacious garden. Groups are most welcome, by prior arrangement.

name: June Six Hotel Berlin City West
description: This hotel is situated in Berlin’s elegant Charlottenburg district, 50 metres from Savignyplatz Square. June Six Hotel Berlin City West offers free Wi-Fi and contemporary-style rooms with a flat-screen smart TV with satellite channels. Hotel June Six Hotel Berlin City West features a modern glass façade and minimalist rooms with stylish wooden floors. All rooms are air-conditioned and include a work desk and private bathroom. A full breakfast buffet is served each morning at the June Six Hotel Berlin City West. This hotel has its own restaurant and bar. Many cafés and restaurants can be found around Savignyplatz Square. Savignyplatz S-Bahn Train Station is just 250 metres away. This offers direct connections to Berlin Main Station, the Hackescher Markt entertainment district and Alexanderplatz Square. The Kurfüstendamm shopping street is a 3-minute walk from June Six Hotel Berlin City West. It is a 10-minute walk from Berlin Zoo and a 15-minute walk from the world-famous KaDeWe department store. The hotel can arrange a hire car on request.

name: Hotel Ludwig van Beethoven
description: This 3-star hotel is 200 metres from Hermannplatz Square, between Berlin’s lively Kreuzberg and Neukölln districts. Hotel Ludwig van Beethoven offers a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and excellent public transport links. The spacious and quiet rooms at the Hotel Beethoven all include satellite TV and a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served from 07:00 to 10:00 each morning in the Beethoven’s bright breakfast room. The roof terrace is open from 07:00 until 22:00 in fine weather. There is a direct bus from Berlin (BER) Airport to Hermannplatz. Alexanderplatz Square is 15 minutes away from the hotel by underground train. The Ludwig van Beethoven Berlin is directly opposite Hasenheide Park. A limited number of free parking spaces are available. Reserving a parking space is not possible!

name: Motel One Berlin - Alexanderplatz
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Berlin, Motel One Berlin-Alexanderplatz offers free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. The property is around 1.3 km from Neues Museum, 400 metres from Alexanderplatz and 1.7 km from Gendarmenmarkt. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Alexanderplatz Underground Station. The units at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower. At Motel One Berlin-Alexanderplatz all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegan options. Speaking German and English, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Berlin Cathedral, Berlin TV Tower and German Historical Museum. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport, 24 km from Motel One Berlin-Alexanderplatz.

name: Enjoy Hotel am Studio
description: This hotel offers underground parking and free Wi-Fi in guest rooms and public areas. It is a 1-minute walk from Theodor-Heuss-Platz Underground Station and a 10-minute walk from Berlin's ICC congress centre. All rooms at the Enjoy Hotel am Studio include a work desk, telephone, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All guests receive a complimentary bottle of water on arrival. A breakfast restaurant with panoramic views can be found on the 7th floor of the Concorde Hotel. In the evenings, guests can have fun at the bowling alley. Enjoy Hotel am Studio is a direct underground ride from Zoologischer Garten and the Kurfürstendamm shopping area.

name: Essential By Dorint Berlin-Adlershof
description: This non-smoking hotel in Berlin’s Adlershof district has a bar and a private car park. BER Berlin-Brandenburg Airport can be reached by bus 164, local train S45 or taxi in 15 minutes. All of the air-conditioned rooms at the Essential by Dorint Berlin-Adlershof include satellite TV, a desk and a bathroom with hairdryer. Wi-Fi is available for free. A breakfast buffet is available each morning at the Essential by Dorint Berlin-Adlershof. International meals are served in the elf99 restaurant. The Dorint’s bar offers a range of cocktails, beers and snacks. The Essential by Dorint Berlin-Adlershof is situated in the WISTA science and technology park. Adlershof S-Bahn Station is a 5-minute walk away, providing direct access to the city centre.

name: Melarose Feng Shui Hotel
description: This Feng Shui hotel in the lively Prenzlauer Berg district of Berlin is just a 10 minutes’ walk from the Volkspark Friedrichshain. It features rooms without electronic smog. Inspired by the 5 elements, the modern rooms at the Melarose Hotel has cable TV, a private bathroom and tea-making facilities. A breakfast buffet is available each morning at the Melarose Feng Shui Hotel. Guests can easily walk to trendy Kollwitzplatz or Danziger Strasse in under 10 minutes. Alexanderplatz and Hackescher Markt can be reached in around 10 minutes with the M4 tram, which stops just outside the hotel. Berlin Main Train Station is just a 15-minute tram ride away.

name: Classik Hotel Hackescher Markt
description: This boutique hotel lies at the Hackescher Markt entertainment district in central Berlin, a 10-minute walk from Alexanderplatz Square. Classik Hotel Hackescher Markt offers classic and modern interiors featuring self check-in, free Wi-Fi and 24/7 virtual receptionist. The bright rooms of the hotel offer a flat-screen, laptop safe and come one complimentary bottle of water per stay. The hotel is within a 5-minute walk of many of Berlin’s coolest fashion boutiques, designer stores and art galleries. The UNESCO Museum Island is also a 5-minute walk away. Hackescher Markt S-Bahn Train Station is only 100 metres away from the hotel. Excellent bus and tram connections are also available. The bright rooms of the hotel offer a flat-screen, laptop safe and come one complimentary bottle of water per stay. Guests are welcome to relax in the stylish lobby or on the courtyard terrace.

name: Nu Wave Hotel Berlin
description: This hotel offers free Wi-Fi internet and in-room flat-screen TVs. It is in Berlin’s Friedrichshain district, 700 metres from the Warschauer Straße City Rail and Underground Station. The rooms at the Nu Wave Hotel Berlin are bright and have a private bathroom. Guests will find free internet terminals in the lobby. The Nu Wave Hotel Berlin is close to many restaurants, pubs and clubs. The Mercedes-Benz sporting arena and concert venue is a 10-minute walk from the nu hotel. Alexanderplatz is 3 stops away.

name: Alfa Hotel
description: This hotel in Berlin’s Tiergarten district enjoys convenient transport links to local attractions, including the Brandenburg Gate and Kurfürstendamm boulevard, both less than 5 km away. Free WiFi is featured. All rooms at the ALFA Hotel include a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Guests can enjoy the daily breakfast buffet or relax in the on-site garden. Additionally, bikes can be rented from the property and laundry services can be booked.

name: Hotel Amo By Amano Friedrichstraße
description: The Boutique Hotel AMO by AMANO offers 93 rooms in four different categories, a high-end bar and an Israeli restaurant. The hotel is very centrally located at Friedrichstrae in Berlin-Mitte and well connected to the public transport via the Oranienburger Tor station. Shops, restaurants and Berlin sights are in walking distance from the hotel and easily reachable for the guests.A very special highlight of the AMO by AMANO boutique hotel is the unique subterranean foyer as well as the hotel bar that is also located underground. The light flooded patio lets the guests forget they are at the very center of the city and offer a calm oasis.The AMO by AMANO offers all of the guests a Mobile Check-in for an individual and comfortable check-in experience as well as an optional Mobile Key that can be downloaded onto the mobile device. Every room also has a tablet with telephone function and diverse service options to guarantee an enjoyable stay at AMO with no wishes left unfulfilled.iHotelier/iStay

name: greet Berlin Alexanderplatz
description: greet Berlin Alexanderplatz located in the heart of the German capital has 61 rooms, an open public area with breakfast room, business area, bistro and a mini market open around the clock. Book now for an affordable, efficient, eco-friendly travel experience.accorhotels.com

name: Upper Room Hotel Kurfurstendamm
description: Situated in the heart of western Berlin, this listed heritage building is a 2-minute walk from Kurfürstendamm shopping street. It offers free Wi-Fi, and is an ideal base for shopping and sightseeing trips. The Upper Room Hotel provides cosy rooms with flat-screen TVs, a work desk, and a private bathroom. The Upper Room Hotel is close to several bus stops, U-Bahn (underground) and S-Bahn (city rail) stations. It provides excellent public transport connections to all parts of Berlin, including the ICC exhibition centre. Many of Berlin's main tourist attractions are within easy walking distance of the Upper Room Hotel. Visit nearby Berlin Zoo, the Theater des Westens (theatre), the world-famous KaDeWe department store or go shopping and dining at the Europa-Center.

name: Holiday Inn Express Berlin City Centre
description: Smart Berlin city-centre hotel close to Potsdamer Platz, with Next Generation bedrooms. The Holiday Inn Express® Berlin City Centre hotel is a short walk from the dining and shopping options of busy Friedrichstrasse. At 40 minutes from Berlin Brandenburg Airport (BER), our hotel offers secure underground parking to drivers at a daily rate. Sections of the Berlin Wall, the shops and nightlife in Potsdamer Platz, Friedrichstrasse and Checkpoint Charlie are a 15-minute walk. We are also an easy stroll from U-Bahn and S-Bahn stations for trips to Alexanderplatz, the Jewish Museum and Brandenburg Gate. You´ll find a full schedule of cultural events and big-name concerts at the tent-shaped Tempodrom next door and a multicultural dining scene a step from our front door.At this hotel you can enjoy:- Inclusive Wi-Fi- Express Start™ Breakfast included in the room rate- A fully equipped meeting roomWelcoming guest rooms are all air-conditioned with Flatscreen TVs and flexible workspaces; they are furnished with blackout curtains and pillow menus to guarantee a good night´s sleep. Our Lobby Bar drinks menu is well stocked with a choice of soft drinks, German lagers and an international wine list.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Mercure Hotel Berlin Zentrum
description: Steeped in tradition, West Berlin is now fresher than ever: attractions such as the KadeWe department store, Kurfuerstendamm shopping district and Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church are popular destination. As a guest in the 3-star Mercure Hotel Berlin Zentrum, you will only be a short walk away from the center. All 78 rooms are air-conditioned and have free WIFI.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Ai Königshof
description: Just a 10-minute walk from the famous Kurfürstendamm shopping street, this hotel in Berlin’s Charlottenburg district offers buffet breakfasts, rooms with free WiFi, and great transport connections. Hotel Al Königshof’s brightly decorated rooms all feature a flat-screen TV and a telephone. The private bathrooms include toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms feature a balcony. A breakfast buffet with fresh bread rolls, cereals and different meats and cheeses is served at Hotel Al Königshof. Restaurants, shops and bars are just a 10-minute walk away. Hotel AI Königshof is conveniently located opposite Charlottenburg S-Bahn Train Station and Wilmersdorfer Straße Underground Station. Several buses stop at Stuttgarter Platz Square.

name: The Circus Hotel
description: Featuring free Wi-Fi and a rooftop terrace, The Circus Hotel is situated in Berlin and offers relaxed accommodation. This trendy hotel is set in the heart of the city. This modern hotel offers a number of facilities, including a 24-hour reception, bicycle rental and a coffee bar. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer local information. Rooms are air-conditioned and have top-of-the-range amenities such as a pillow menu and a flat-screen TV. They are all soundproofed and include a laptop safe, converters/voltage adaptors and an in-room safe. Those staying at The Circus Hotel Berlin can enjoy the on-site bar, suitably situated for a drink. Guests are also able to try one of the many bars and restaurants in the local area. The Circus Hotel is close to Rosa-Luxemburg-Platz Underground Station and Berlin Hackescher Markt Railway Station, making it easy for guests to explore Berlin and its surrounding areas. The local area is also well known for its shops and boutiques.Revato

name: Novum Hotel Aldea Berlin Centrum
description: This hotel is a 5-minute underground ride from the Kurfürstendamm shopping area and Potsdamer Platz Square. It offers soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi, and a colourful breakfast room. The 3-star-superior Novum Hotel Aldea Berlin Centrum has bright rooms with cable TV and safety deposit boxes. All rooms have an en suite bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms are strictly non-smoking. A German-style breakfast buffet is provided at the Novum Hotel Aldea Berlin Centrum. Many restaurants and bars can be found in the area, and the famous KaDaWe shopping mall is a 15-minute walk away. Located in Berlin’s Schöneberg district, the hotel is just 200 metres from Bülowstraße Underground on the U2 line. It provides a direct connection to Berlin Zoo and Alexanderplatz.

name: Monbijou Hotel
description: Just 300 metres from Berlin’s lively Hackescher Markt square, this boutique hotel features a fitness centre, rental bikes and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi. Museum Island is only 400 metres away. Decorated in a vintage British style, the rooms offer large windows and wooden floors. Comforts include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an iPod docking station and a private bathroom. Monbijou Hotel offers a restaurant and bistro, and drinks can be enjoyed at the bar. You can also relax with a book in the Monbijou’s library area. A large variety of cafés, bars and shops can be found within a 5-minute walk of Hotel Monbijou. Hackescher Markt S-Bahn Train Station is 150 metres away, providing a connection to Alexanderplatz and the Friedrichstraße shopping street.

name: Ibis Berlin Hauptbahnhof
description: The ibis right at Berlin's main train station offers 172 comfortable rooms including WIFI and Sweet Beds by ibis. Strengthen yourself for the day in the morning with our rich breakfast buffet. Afterwards, get advice at the reception about insider tips, restaurant recommendations or bike rentals. Enjoy 24/7 drinks and snacks in our Charlie's Corner Express lounge. Popular sights of the city and the main train station can be reached within a few minutes' walk.accorhotels.com

name: the niu Hide
description: Located in Berlin, 4.4 km from Alexanderplatz, the niu Hide features a bar. Located around 5 km from Berlin TV Tower, the hotel with free WiFi is also 5 km away from Museum Island. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. All rooms feature a private bathroom and a Teufel Boomster™ sound system. This accommodation has a restaurant and a buffet breakfast is available each morning at the niu Hide. This accommodation also offers a 24-hour reception. German Historical Museum is 5 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Airport, 24 km from the niu Hide.

name: Yggotel Spurv
description: Located in Wilmersdorf, Novum Hotel Lichtburg am Kurfuerstendamm is a perfect starting point from which to explore Berlin. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, elevator, safety deposit boxes are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, heating, wake-up service. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Novum Hotel Lichtburg am Kurfuerstendamm combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Berlin unforgettable.priceline.com

name: Motel Plus Berlin
description: Located in the heart of the trendy district Neukölln, Motel Plus Berlin offers comfortable rooms a short walk from modern bars and galleries. Free WiFi is available in public areas of the hotel. Motel Plus Berlin is a completely non-smoking hotel. All rooms are designed in contemporary style, featuring cable TV and an en suite bathroom. The hotel is 2 km from the large Hasenheide Park, and attractions in central Berlin such as Checkpoint Charlie and the Brandenburg Gate can be reached within 25 minutes on public transport. A breakfast buffet is offered each morning, and guests can enjoy snacks from the café on the lobby terrace. Within a 5-minute walk there are various restaurants specialising in international cuisine. Motel Plus Berlin is 300 metres from the Neukölln and Hermannstraße Underground and S-Bahn Train Stations. Berlin Main Train Station is 11 km away.

name: Hotel Ambiente Berlin City
description: This family-run hotel is located in the Schöneberg district of Berlin, a 10-minute walk from the world-famous KaDeWe Department Store. Hotel Ambiente offers classically furnished rooms, all with free Wi-Fi. All rooms at standard Hotel Ambiente Berlin feature cable TV, a refrigerator and a private bathroom with a shower. A free internet terminal is available in the lobby. A breakfast buffet is served from 07:00 to 10:00 each morning in the Ambiente's bright breakfast room, which is decorated with colourful paintings. There is also a drinks vending machine at the hotel, as well as many bars and cafés nearby. Hotel Ambiente is a 5-minute walk from Nollendorfplatz Underground Station on the U2 line. This offers direct connections to Berlin's ICC Exhibition Centre, the Olympic Stadium and Potsdamer Platz. An underground parking garage is available at Hotel Ambiente. Berlin's A100 city motorway is just 3 km away.

name: Flottwell Berlin Hotel & Residenz am Park
description: Flottwell Berlin Hotel & Residenz am Park is located in the heart of Berlin, a 5-minute walk from Gleisdreieck Underground Station and 50 metres from Gleisdreieck Park. Guests are offered spacious rooms with free WiFi. The modern rooms at Flottwell Berlin Hotel & Residenz am Park include fine parquet floors, a large desk as well as a seating area with a HD satellite TV. The bright en suite bathroom comes with a shower or bath and a hairdryer. Breakfast is available daily, while guests are welcome to enjoy a drink in the hotel's bar and each room includes a kitchenette with a refrigerator. Microwaves are available on request. Guests can rent bicycles and e-bikes on site and further facilities offered include grocery deliveries, a ticket service and luggage storage. Board games, books and children's films are also available, in addition to seven different playgrounds, including swings and a trampoline. The hotel is 3.9 km from Alexanderplatz, 3.3 km from Kurfürstendamm and 1.1 km from Potsdamer Platz. Tegel Airport is 8 km away.

name: Novum Hotel Kronprinz Berlin
description: Just 100 metres from the Kurfürstendamm boulevard, this historic hotel in Berlin offers classical-style rooms, a terrace, and a 24-hour reception. Halensee S-Bahn Train Station is 200 metres away. The non-smoking Novum Hotel Kronprinz Berlin has spacious rooms with cable TV, minibar, and desk. Some include a balcony or bay window. Each morning starts with a varied buffet breakfast in the Novum Kronprinz's conservatory. The bar and library invite guests to relax throughout the day. Trains run from Halensee S-Bahn Station to the Brandenburg Gate in 25 minutes. The Novum Hotel Kronprinz is just a 2-minute drive from the A100 motorway.

name: Arte Luise Kunsthotel
description: Offering stylish rooms designed by renowned artists, this unique hotel in the heart of Berlin is just a 10-minute walk from the Brandenburg Gate right next to the busy railway viaduct between Friedrichstrasse station and the main station, the Reichstag Building and Friedrichstrasse Train Station. Each individually furnished room at Arte Luise Kunsthotel includes modern, artistic décor and features its own original concept. Rooms have either a private or shared bathroom and free wifi is available in the lobby. German and Mediterranean cuisine is served in the hotel restaurant, and guests can relax on the spacious courtyard terrace. Light snacks and drinks are available at the snack bar. The River Spree and the famous Unter den Linden Boulevard are within a 10-minute walk of Arte Luise. S-Bahn (city rail) and underground services at Friedrichstrasse allow you to explore the whole capital with ease.

name: Hotel Augusta Am Kurfürstendamm
description: Offering classical-style rooms, free WiFi, and varied breakfasts, this family-run, 3-star hotel in Berlin is just 50 metres from the Kurfürstendamm shopping street. Uhlandstraße Underground Station is 100 metres away. Surrounded by the stylish boutiques of the Charlottenburg district, Hotel Augusta has colourful rooms and suites with satellite TV, a safety deposit box, and a minibar. They have an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. The Augusta’s breakfast room features elegant chandeliers and natural wood furniture. Many cafés and restaurants are less than a 10-minute walk away. The Augusta Berlin’s reception is open 24 hours a day. Concert tickets can be booked here. The Messe Berlin exhibition grounds are a 20-minute bus journey from the Augusta Hotel. Trains run from Uhlandstraße Underground Station to Potsdamer Platz Square in 13 minutes.

name: Hotel Birgit Berlin Mitte
description: This 3-star hotel is located in the trendy Prenzlauer Berg district of Berlin. It offers rooms with soundproofed windows, free internet connection and a garden with terrace. All of the non-smoking rooms at the Hotel BIRGIT Berlin Mitte include satellite TV, a work desk, and a private bathroom. Breakfast buffets are available at Hotel BIRGIT Berlin Mitte. The hotel bar is open 24 hours a day. Hotel BIRGIT Berlin Mitte is a 20-minute walk from the popular Hackescher Markt and Alexanderplatz areas. There are many stylish shops, bars, and restaurants nearby. Hotel BIRGIT Berlin Mitte is a 3-minute walk from Senefelderplatz Underground Station. This provides direct connections to the Potsdamer Platz square and the Olympic Stadium.

name: ArtHotel Connection
description: No description found

name: Amc Hotel - Schöneberg
description: No description found

name: Hotel Brandies Berlin
description: This privately run hotel offers free Wi-Fi and large rooms with Art Nouveau details. Hotel Brandies is a 10-minute walk from the ICC trade fair and a 1-minute walk from Kaiserdamm Underground Station. Built in 1909, Hotel Brandies has high stucco ceilings, large hallways, Art Nouveau windows and a historic lift. All rooms are non-smoking and include cable TV, a minibar and safe. Hotel Brandies is a direct underground ride from the Olympic Stadium, Zoologischer Garten and Potsdamer Platz. It is just seconds from the A100 city motorway.

name: Amaya Motel
description: Set in Berlin within 7 km of Topography of Terror and 7.2 km of Checkpoint Charlie, Amaya Motel provides rooms with free WiFi. The property is situated 7.3 km from Alexanderplatz Underground Station, 7.4 km from Gendarmenmarkt and 7.5 km from Potsdamer Platz. The property is allergy-free and is located 6.8 km from East Side Gallery. At the motel, every room includes a desk. At Amaya Motel every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Alexanderplatz is 7.9 km from the accommodation, while Berlin Cathedral is 8.1 km away. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport, 17 km from Amaya Motel.

name: Hampton by Hilton Berlin City East Side Gallery
description: Welcome to the Hampton by Hilton Berlin City Centre East Side Gallery, located in the neighborhood of Berlin Friedrichshain, in the heart of Berlin's Entertainment District. Next to Mercedes-Benz Arena and the famous Berlin Wall, our hotel is footsteps away from the Verti Music Hall, East Side Gallery, and Magazin Heeresbäckerei. Explore the variety of clubs, restaurants and bars within walking distance, such as Simon-Dach-Kiez, RAW area in Friedrichshain, and Kreuzberg. With easy access to public transportation including S-Warschauer Strasse, S-Ostbahnhof, and Berlin Central Station/Alexanderplatz/Potsdamer Platz, our hotel is less than a 40-minute drive from Berlin Brandenburg Airport (BER). Enjoy signature amenities such as Hampton's included hot breakfast and complimentary WiFi, available throughout the hotel. Relax in a modern guest room, furnished with a fresh and comfy Hampton bed and ergonomically designed work area. Start your day right with Hampton's free, hot breakfast served every morning. Pick up snacks and essentials at our convenience store and enjoy free coffee and tea service in the lobby. Work out in the 24-hour fitness center. We also have a business center, open 24 hours for your convenience.Hilton

name: Calma Berlin Mitte
description: The CALMA Berlin Mitte welcomes you in the heart of Berlin, 300 metres from the trendy Oranienburger Straße area, and is a 20-minute walk from the Berlin Central Station. On a sunny day you can relax on the terrace. Free WiFi is offered throughout the hotel. The rooms feature modern design using wood, grey and white as well pink accents in a historic building where the state printing works of the former East Germany were housed. A delicious breakfast buffet is available each morning. Tea and coffee is complimentary for hotel guests from 11am to 9pm. CALMA Berlin Mitte is situated in a quiet courtyard which offers relaxing accommodation away from the city noise.

name: Hotel Castell
description: This hotel in Berlin's Charlottenburg district is just steps away from the Kurfürstendamm shopping street. It offers an Art Nouveau design, daily breakfast buffets, and great transport links. The Hotel Castell am Ku'Damm provides brightly furnished rooms with TV sets, and almost all have a private bathroom. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Adenauerplatz and Uhlandstraße Underground Train Stations are a 7-minute walk from Hotel Castell am Ku'Damm. It offers fast links to Tegel Airport and the ICC Messe Exhibition Centre.

name: Intercityhotel Berlin Ostbahnhof
description: Set next to Berlin’s Ostbahnhof railway station, this modern hotel offers convenient access to the East-Side-Gallery, the Mercedes-Benz Arena, and trendy nightlife venues. The InterCityHotel Berlin Ostbahnhof’s bright, soundproofed rooms are all equipped with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. After an exciting day in the German capital, enjoy traditional cuisine or a local beer in the hotel restaurant and Zille-Eck bar. The modern InterCityHotel Berlin Ostbahnhof benefits from excellent S-Bahn (city rail) and bus connections. Attractions including the Alexanderplatz square and historic Friedrichstrasse are just a short ride away.

name: Hotel & Apartments Zarenhof Berlin Prenzlauer Berg
description: Hotel & Apartments Zarenhof Berlin Prenzlauer Berg offers modern accommodation and free Wi-Fi. The Hotel & Apartmenthaus Zarenhof is a restored early 20th-century building in a quiet courtyard. It lies beside Eberswalderstraße Underground Station, only a 5-minute train ride from Alexanderplatz. At our breakfast buffet, guests can enjoy warm and cold delicacies. The rooms, suites and apartments are easily accessed by a lift and include a flat-screen TV. Some come with a kitchenette, seating area and balcony. Hotel & Apartments Zarenhof Berlin Prenzlauer Berg is just a one-minute walk from the U2 Eberswalder underground station, while Berlin main train station is just 3.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Airport (BER) Willy Brandt, 30 km away.

name: Hotel Alt Tegel
description: Discover the green north of Berlin from this hotel, which lies close to the lake Tegeler See and an underground station offering connections to Friedrichstraße and Alexanderplatz. The Hotel Alt-Tegel provides attractive rooms and apartments. Right outside the front door you will find the Greenwich Promenade with its jetty for boat trips, the lido at Tegel, Tegel Castle and the Tegeler Fließ nature conservation area leading to Lübars.

name: Motel One Berlin - Tiergarten
description: This design hotel in Berlin's Tiergarten district is a 5-minute walk from the KaDeWe department store. Motel One Tiergarten offers free Wi-Fi and stylish rooms with a flat-screen TV and a mobile desk. The air-conditioned rooms at the Motel One Berlin-Tiergarten feature distinctive light-blue decor and wooden floors. All rooms include a modern bathroom with granite and a mosaic design. The Motel One Berlin-Tiergarten's elegant One Lounge includes designer furniture. Snacks and drinks are served here 24 hours a day. Wittenbergplatz Underground Station is a 5-minute walk from the Motel One. Bus 100 also stops nearby, offering direct connections to the Reichstag parliament and Alexanderplatz square.

name: Art Hotel Charlottenburger Hof Berlin
description: This hotel is just a 1 minute walk from Charlottenburg Train Station, which provides links to Berlin Main Station. It offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi, and the Kurfürstendamm shopping street is 800 metres away. Enjoying excellent transport connections from both Tegel and Schönefeld airports, the Art Hotel Charlottenburger Hof Berlin is also only a short journey away from most of Berlin’s cultural attractions, cafés, restaurants and nightlife. Each room has been individually designed and offers free WiFi.

name: Hotel Berlin Mitte by Campanile
description: Free WiFi in bright rooms with timeless design are offered at this 3-star superior hotel in Berlin’s central Mitte district. Berlin Main Train Station is a 10-minute walk away and rental bikes are available. Rooms at the Hotel Berlin Mitte by Campanile include a flat-screen TV as well as an en-suite bathroom with luxurious rain shower. A breakfast buffet is served daily at the hotel’s restaurant, which can be ordered to the room. Drinks are served at the hotel bar. Hotel Berlin Mitte by Campanile is next to the Natural History Museum and a 10-minute walk from the famous Friedrichstraße shopping street. Many restaurants and cafés can be found in the area.

name: B&B Hotel Berlin City-Ost
description: This hotel in Berlin's trendy Friedrichshain district offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour lounge and bar, and excellent transport connections. B&B Hotel Berlin City-Ost is located directly at Samariterstraße Underground Station. Free WiFi is offered in all areas. B&B Hotel Berlin City-Ost offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with satellite LCD TV and free wired internet. Visitors can start their day with a tasty breakfast buffet, served each morning in the City Ost’s spacious dining area. The East Side Gallery is only 3 km from the Best Western. Alexanderplatz square is just 5 underground stations away. Bicycles can be hired for exploring Berlin.

name: Hotel Les Nations
description: This hotel is quietly located in the centre of Berlin, a 5-minute drive from Berlin Main Station and the A100 motorway. Les Nations offers bicycle hire and secure parking in the courtyard. The homelike rooms at Hotel Les Nations are individually furnished and all include free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. All rooms can be accessed by elevator. A rich buffet breakfast is served each morning. Guests also enjoy tourist information, free newspapers and complimentary internet access at reception. Hansaplatz Underground Station is just 750 metres away. Direct buses are available nearby with direct connections to Tegel Airport and Berlin Main Station. Hotel Les Nations is 1.5 km from the iconic Victory Column in Berlin's extensive Tiergarten park. The hotel is within 3 km of the Brandenburg Gate, Reichstag (parliament) and Ku'damm shopping boulevard.

name: Senscity Hotel Berlin Spandau
description: This 3-star hotel is located in the quiet Spandau district of Berlin. It offers rooms with Wi-Fi, good public transport links and easy access to the Olympic Stadium. The rooms at the SensCity Hotel Berlin Spandau include cable TV, a coffee tea station and soundproofed windows.The superior rooms include a minibar and car parking. A la carte breakfast is served daily. Guests are welcome to relax with a drink in the SensCity Hotel Berlin Spandau's bar. The property has limited parking spaces available for an additional fee, but reservations are not possible. The Stresow S-Bahn (city rail) station is a 10-minute walk from the SensCity hotel. Spandau's historic Old Town district is just 1 km away.

name: Hotel Prens Berlin
description: This 3-star superior hotel in Berlin’s vibrant Kreuzberg district offers free Wi-Fi. Hotel Prens Berlin faces the Landwehrkanal Canal, and is just 100 metres from Schönleinstraße Underground Station. The bright rooms at the Hotel Prens feature modern décor, A flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with shower are standard. Breakfast is available each morning in the bistro-bar. Drinks and snacks are also available throughout the day. Breakfast can also be delivered to the rooms upon request. Hotel Prens is a 5-minute metro ride from Alexanderplatz Square, which offers direct connections to both Tegel and Schönefeld Airports. It offers a direct and convenient underground connection (3 stops) to the Mercedes Benz Arena, only 2.5 km away. Free public parking is available on-site, while paid private parking spaces are also available.

name: Airporthotel Berlin Adlershof
description: This hotel in Berlin-Adlershof offers well-equipped rooms and a daily breakfast buffet. It is located in the WISTA Science & Technology Park, just a 10-minute train ride from Berlin Brandenburg Airport (BER). The rooms at the 3-star Airporthotel Berlin-Adlershof include floor-to-ceiling windows, a modern bathroom and Wi-Fi internet access. The Airporthotel offers a large breakfast buffet each morning, which includes a range of organic products. In the evenings, a variety of drinks are served at the hotel bar. The Adlershof S-Bahn (city rail) station is just 400 metres from the Airporthotel Berlin-Adlershof, providing a direct link to Berlin Brandenburg Airport (BER) and Berlin Hauptbahnhof (main railway station).

name: Motel One Berlin Bellevue
description: This Motel One Berlin-Bellevue provides air-conditioned rooms, a 24-hour bar and free Wi-Fi. Bellevue Palace and the Tiergarten Park are a 5-minute walk away. All of the stylish rooms at the Motel One Berlin-Bellevue include a flat-screen TV and a dark granite bathroom with a rainforest shower. Featuring large sofas and modern décor, the One Lounge combines a lobby, a bar and a café. International drinks, coffee specialities and a variety of snacks are available here. The Bellevue S-Bahn (city rail) Station is just 600 metres from the Motel One Bellevue, providing a link to Berlin’s Main Train Station in just 2 minutes. Some free parking spaces are available on the street nearby. A certain number of supervised garage parking spaces are available for an additional charge, and these must be reserved directly at the hotel.

name: Meininger Hotel Berlin Hauptbahnhof
description: This hotel is located in the heart of Berlin, between Berlin Central Station and the Reichstag Parliament. The MEININGER offers soundproofed rooms with modern design and a flat-screen TV. The non-smoking rooms at MEININGER Hotel Berlin Hauptbahnhof all feature a private bathroom. Free Wi-Fi is available in all rooms. Breakfast can be purchased each morning in the trendy M-Lounge. Guests are welcome to use the MEININGER's shared kitchen, TV and stereo, or relax in the Game Zone area. A washing machine and tumble dryer are also available for a fee. The MEININGER Berlin Hauptbahnhof offers panoramic views of the Government District and the Tiergarten Park. The Brandenburg Gate and Unter den Linden boulevard are a 10-minute walk away, and excellent public transport connections are available from Berlin Central Station.

name: Hotel Berliner Bär
description: This hotel in Berlin lies directly beside the historic Tempelhof Airport, a 12-minute underground train journey from Checkpoint Charlie. It offers a breakfast room with a sun terrace facing towards the iconic former airport. The Hotel Berliner Bär has spacious, contemporary-style rooms with a TV, minibar, and modern bathroom with hairdryer. A free internet terminal with printer and scanner is located in the lobby. The lobby bar is open 24 hours a day. The Felixstraße bus stop is opposite the Berliner Bär Hotel. Buses run to the Kurfürstendamm shopping street in 25 minutes. The Tempelhof underground and city rail station is 900 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel Gat Point Charlie
description: This design hotel is centrally located in Berlin's central Mitte district, just 50 metres from Checkpoint Charlie and the Friedrichstrasse shopping street. It offers free WiFi, modern rooms and great transport connections. Situated in the Stasi secret police headquarters in the former East Germany, Gat Point Charlie is an industrial structure featuring minimalist-style rooms. Each features satellite TV and a desk, and the private bathrooms have toiletries and a hairdryer. A healthy and balanced breakfast is provided every morning in the hotel’s stylish breakfast room. Tapas and light meals are available in the evenings, and the bar is a great place to enjoy cocktails and make friends. Stadtmitte Underground Station is a 3-minute walk away. From here, guests can reach Potsdamer Platz in 2 minutes or Alexanderplatz Square in 6 minutes.

name: acom-Hotel Berlin-City South
description: acom Hotel Berlin City SouthModern business-hotel Easy access to the airport, shopping and entertainment precincts (Gropius Passagen) 30 minutes drive to the city center 56 comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi and including a bottle of mineralwater per stay Early check-in 11 am upon availability Late check out 14 pm upon availabilityiHotelier/iStay

name: Motel One Berlin - Hackescher Markt
description: This hotel next to Berlin's famous Alexanderplatz square offers modern rooms with a flat-screen TV. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi and great public transport connections. The air-conditioned rooms of the Motel One Berlin-Hackescher Markt include bathrooms with granite décor. A big breakfast buffet is served at the Motel One. The One Lounge also provides 24-hour reception service. Drinks and snacks are available 24 hours a day. The transport services of the Alexanderplatz square are just a 2-minute walk away from the Motel One. A direct bus connects you to Tegel Airport in 35 minutes and regional trains go directly to Schönefeld Airport.

name: Ibis Berlin Neukölln
description: The subway and bus stop are just a 2-minute walk away. Optimal connection to the city center and BER airport. The Estrel Convention Center can also be reached in a few minutes. Our rooms are modern and ensure a pleasant stay. We are happy to welcome you to our rich breakfast buffet.accorhotels.com

name: Meininger Hotel Berlin Mitte
description: Located beside Oranienburger Straße S-Bahn Train Station and surrounded by trendy restaurants and bars, this non-smoking hotel in the Mitte district of Berlin offers stylish rooms and a 24-hour reception. WiFi is provided free of charge in all areas. All of the brightly decorated rooms at MEININGER Hotel Berlin Mitte are fitted with a flat-screen TV, a night light directly at the bed, and a private bathroom. Breakfasts can be purchased in the MEININGER’s colourful breakfast room. The hotel features lockers at the reception and laundry facilities. MEININGER Berlin Mitte is just 500 metres from the popular Oranienburger Straße bar strip and the Friedrichstraße shopping street. The cultural hotspots on Museum Island are also less than 750 metres away. Trains run from Oranienburger Straße S-Bahn Station to the famous Brandenburg Gate in 3 minutes. Private parking is available at the MEININGER Mitte.

name: Meininger Hotel Berlin Tiergarten
description: Situated in Berlin, in the new Schultheiss-Quartier in Moabit (Shopping Mall) and next to Tiergarten park, 2.4 km from Natural History Museum, MEININGER Hotel Berlin Tiergarten offers a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk for guests. It is located 2.5 km from Brandenburg Gate and 2.8 km away from Potsdamer Platz. All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at MEININGER Hotel Berlin Tiergarten also have free WiFi, while selected rooms also feature a city view. Guest rooms include a desk. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. The parking is available in the nearby Schultheiss-Quartier. Theatre and Comedy at Kurfuerstendamm is 3.1 km from MEININGER Hotel Berlin Tiergarten, while Kurfürstendamm is 3.1 km away. Berlin Brandenburg Airport is 31 km from the property.

name: Hotel Pankow
description: This hotel enjoys a convenient location, located in the green and tranquil Pankow district of Berlin, just to the north of the German capital. Free Wi-Fi is available in the property. The Hotel Pankow is easily accessible by public transport, and from the local bus, tram and S-Bahn (city train) stops you can quickly and easily get into the heart of Berlin. You will appreciate the modern and cosily furnished rooms, many of which were renovated in 2018. Some rooms are particularly quiet as they face out on to the inner courtyard. The Hotel Pankow helps you to combine the advantages of these peaceful surroundings, with the convenience of being close to Berlin for leisure, sightseeing or business reasons.

name: Motel One Berlin Ku'Damm
description: This modern hotel in central Berlin offers spacious rooms, on-site parking and free Wi-Fi internet. Zoologischer Garten Train Station is 200 metres away. The soundproofed rooms of the Motel One Berlin Ku'Damm feature a flat-screen TV and adjustable air conditioning. The granite bathrooms are fitted with a rain shower. The 24-hour One Lounge is a lobby, breakfast café and bar. It features designer furniture and offers hot and cold snacks around the clock. The shops of Kurfürstendamm are a 5-minute walk from Motel One Berlin.

name: Hotel Bohemia
description: Hotel Bohemia is situated in Berlin, 4.3 km from East Side Gallery and 6 km from Checkpoint Charlie. A terrace and a garden can be enjoyed on site. Each room includes a flat-screen TV. Some units have a seating area for your convenience. Certain units include views of the garden or city. The rooms have a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. The hotel also offers car hire as well as luggage storage space. Friedrichstraße is 6 km from Hotel Bohemia, while Gendarmenmarkt is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Berlin Schönefeld Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

name: Dietrich-Bonhoeffer-Hotel
description: Boasting excellent transport connections, this 3-star Superior hotel in Berlin's Mitte district is set in a side street behind the Friedrichstadtpalast musical theatre, just off the historic Friedrichstrasse. The non-smoking Dietrich-Bonhoeffer-Hotel makes a perfect base for exploring the German capital. You can walk to the Museum Island, Brandenburg Gate, Hackescher Markt district, and Unter den Linden boulevard within 20 minutes. The Charité university hospital is a 14-minute walk away. Use the tram, U-Bahn (underground), and S-Bahn (city rail) links on the Friedrichstrasse to travel throughout the city. Relax in the Dietrich-Bonhoeffer-Hotel's modern en-suite rooms, and take advantage of the free Wi-Fi internet access. Start each day with the hotel's rich breakfast buffet. Delicious coffee and cake are served in the bright foyer, while the Angelus restaurant will treat you to hearty Brandenburg specialities featuring select organic produce.

name: Hotel Neuer Fritz Berlin
description: Overlooking the River Spree, this boutique hotel on Berlin’s famous Friedrichstrasse Shopping Street offers elegant rooms and excellent transport connections. Free WiFi is provided in all areas. Rooms at Hotel Neuer Fritz are classically furnished. Each has a large flat-screen TV and work desk, and a spacious bathroom with hairdryer. The building boasts Plattenbau architecture, and was one of the last built in the former East Germany. Trains, trams and buses run from Friedrichstrasse Station, 300 metres away. From here, guests can reach Alexanderplatz and the Brandenburg Gate in just 5 minutes. Bicycles tours run from directly outside the hotel, and bikes can be rented at Hotel Neuer Fritz.

name: Campanile Berlin Brandenburg Airport
description: Located in Schönefeld and within 18 km of East Side Gallery, Campanile Berlin Brandenburg Airport features a bar, allergy-free rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is set 20 km from Gendarmenmarkt, 20 km from Alexanderplatz and 21 km from Berlin Cathedral. The property is non-smoking and is situated 20 km from Alexanderplatz Underground Station. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Languages spoken at the reception include German and English, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed. Berlin TV Tower is 21 km from Campanile Berlin Brandenburg Airport, while Topography of Terror is 21 km away. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt, 3 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Anna 1908
description: This 3-star hotel enjoys a tranquil location in a quiet side street in the western Berlin district of Steglitz, and offers excellent public transport connections to all parts of the city. Featuring its beautiful original 19th-century façade, Anna 1908 provides modern and comfortable rooms in the peaceful Friedenau area of Berlin. The rooms were all renovated in 2018 and feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a desk. Wake up in Anna 1908 to a delicious and healthy breakfast buffet every morning. Take advantage of the excellent public transport connections near the hotel. From the nearby bus, underground and city train stops, you can quickly and easily get to all parts of Berlin. Anna 1908 is close the Schloßstraße, one of Berlin’s most popular shopping streets.

name: Hotel Mit-mensch
description: Set in Berlin and within 7 km of East Side Gallery, Hotel Mit-Mensch has a garden, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi. The property is situated 9.1 km from Alexanderplatz Underground Station, 10 km from Alexanderplatz and 10 km from Berlin Cathedral. Berlin TV Tower is 11 km from the hotel and German Historical Museum is 11 km away. At the hotel, all rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. Guests at Hotel Mit-Mensch can enjoy a continental breakfast. Neues Museum is 11 km from the accommodation, while Pergamon Museum is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport, 13 km from Hotel Mit-Mensch.

name: Hotel Grenzfall Berlin
description: Hotel Grenzfall lies in the central Mitte district of Berlin, steps from the Berlin Wall documentation centre. It offers modern rooms and a restaurant with a bar and terrace. All rooms at the Hotel Grenzfall include satellite TV and internet access. Some rooms have a balcony. The Hotel Grenzfall has a beautiful, spacious garden with a pavilion, tea house and goldfish pond. A breakfast buffet is available each morning in the Hotel Grenzfall. The restaurant serves à la carte dishes. Hotel Grenzfall Berlin is a 5-minute walk from Bernauer Straße underground station and Nordbahnhof train station. This hotel is the first Integration Hotel in Berlin Mitte, supporting the employment of disabled and non-disabled staff.

name: Gästehaus Lazarus
description: No description found

name: Pension Peters
description: No description found

name: Yggotel Ravn
description: Located in Wilmersdorf, Novum Hotel Franke Berlin am Kurfuerstendamm is a perfect starting point from which to explore Berlin. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, mirror, non smoking rooms, heating, wake-up service. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort makes Novum Hotel Franke Berlin am Kurfuerstendamm the perfect choice for your stay in Berlin.priceline.com

name: Parkhotel Marzahn
description: No description found

name: Meininger Hotel Berlin East Side Gallery
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, MEININGER Hotel Berlin East Side Gallery is located opposite of the East Side Gallery in Berlin's district Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests can relax at the on-site bar or the gaming area. Alexanderplatz is 2.4 km from MEININGER Hotel Berlin East Side Gallery, while Berlin TV Tower is 2.4 km away. The Museum Island is 2.9 km away. Ostbahnhof train station is 500 metres from the hotel. Berlin Brandenburg Airport is 25 km from MEININGER Hotel Berlin East Side Gallery.

name: the niu Dwarf
description: Located in Berlin, 4.3 km from Zoologischer Garten underground station, the niu Dwarf provides accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Located around 5.5 km from Berliner Philharmonie, the hotel with free WiFi is also 5.7 km away from Topography of Terror. The property is allergy-free and is situated 4.5 km from Kurfürstendamm. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At the niu Dwarf each room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking German and English at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Checkpoint Charlie is 5.8 km from the niu Dwarf, while Potsdamer Platz is 5.8 km away. The nearest airport is Berlin Brandenburg Willy Brandt Airport, 23 km from the hotel.

name: Allegra
description: Dating from 1861, this 3-star hotel offers free internet in the rooms, traditional cuisine and a central location in Berlin. It lies 300 metres from the Friedrichstrasse shopping area. The quiet rooms at martas Hotel Allegra Berlin include a TV, and a private bathroom. Across the street, in the Albrechtshof hotel, you will find the ALvis restaurant. Local dishes are served here throughout the day. Drinks and snacks are available in the Albrechtshof's bar in the evenings. Friedrichstrasse underground and S-Bahn (city rail) station is just a 5-minute walk from martas Hotel Allegra Berlin.
